about_the_game:
Allows you to change the battle music to tracks from Devil May Cry 2. Use the Gallery > Jukebox option to change music (available after starting mission 2).

Track 1: Fire Away (Dante battle theme 1)
Track 2: Wings of the GUARDIAN (Lucia battle theme)
Track 3: Shoot the Works (Dante battle theme 2)

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game contains strong langauge, violence and nudity.
